entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Snow level 1900 metres. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:49 AM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. A few flurries beginning this evening. Snow level 2000 metres lowering to valley bottom this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 7:49 AM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
